steps.title: Welcome to your dashboard!
steps.body: Think of your dashboard as base camp – you can see which assignments are due this week, review your past work, and answer practice questions in topics where you need extra review.

steps.title: Here’s where you see personal analytics
steps.body: The Performance Forecast is the compass in your pocket: it helps you measure how you’re are doing on each topic, and it gives you an opportunity to get extra practice.

steps.title: Here’s where you can get more information on OpenStax Tutor features
steps.body: Review your Getting Started Guide to learn about features in OpenStax Tutor, like two-step questions, spaced practice, highlighting, note-taking and more.

steps.title: The red clock means your assignment is past due
steps.body: If an assignment is late, a red clock will appear on the dashboard. Your instructor decides whether or not to accept late work.

steps.title: Here’s where you see your progress and correctness
steps.body: Feedback on your completed homework questions will become available when your instructor says it will — either immediately or after the due date passes.
